name: Dungeon Ops- Demo
description:
Dungeon Ops is 2d Roguelike game created in unity. Here player get spawned in randomly generated map and your goal is to clear the dungeon by killing enemies earn more money to upgrade health and buy explosive weapons.

Controls

  1.  W,A,S,D for Movement.
  2. Mouse to target and Left Click to Fire.
  3. Space to Dash.
  4. Tab for Switching weapons.
